item.title: katex
item.author: author@example.com (Author)
item.description: Cheat Sheet Download Using displaystyle We can use \displaystyle to make font look better, here is the difference. Add nothing or using \textstyle The quadratic equation is $\textstyle x = \frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}$ Using \displaystyle The quadratic equation is $\displaystyle x = \frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}$
